mapper.update: update user set UserName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CT = #{ct,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BirthDay = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, UserName, CT, Email, Phone, Address, Sex, BirthDay, Password from user
